description:
Made from a canvas of 65 % recycled polyester and 35 % cotton, this jacket features a collar and a sherpa inner lining made entirely from 100 % recycled polyester. With four hands warmer pockets, it ensures warmth and comfort during your favourite activities. Additionally, it offers two flap pockets on the chest and an internal pocket to store your personal belongings.

The Laurentides Work Jacket is designed with an articulated back, providing enhanced mobility between the shoulders and granting you the freedom to work efficiently without compromising your movements. Whether you're working at the cottage, hiding away in a hunting cache, or simply enjoying the fall weather, this jacket will be your next go-to.
name: Hooke Laurentides Sherpa Work Jacket - Mens
